{{ZScriptNote}} __NOTOC__
'''[[Classes:Actor|Actor]]'''
native clearscope static double '''Normalize180'''(double ang)
== Usage == Normalizes the given angle to a range of [-180, 180]. Useful if it's unknown what the actual range of the angle will be (such as with the player's angle).
=== Parameters === *''ang'' - The angle to normalize
=== Return value === Returns the normalized angle.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]] [[Category:Actor static functions]]
